question: Which country reported the worldâ€™s first case of bird flu strain H5N8 being transmitted to human beings?
explanation:
Russia has recently registered the first case of a strain of bird flu virus named A(H5N8) being passed to humans from birds.
The company has reported the matter to the World Health Organization (WHO). Recently, the outbreaks of the H5N8 strain were reported in several countries- Russia, Europe, China, the Middle East and North Africa in recent months but only in poultry so far.
